thoughts.text: I think I should use the 'google' command to search for more information about the Brno Reservoir trail.
thoughts.reasoning: By using the 'google' command, I can search for more information about the Brno Reservoir trail, such as the length of the trail, the difficulty level, and any recommended gear. This will help me prepare for my exploration of the trail and ensure that I have a safe and enjoyable experience.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'google' command to search for more information about the Brno Reservoir trail.
thoughts.criticism: I need to remember to be careful when clicking on links and to only visit reputable websites. I should also verify any information I find with other sources to ensure its accuracy.
